players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Charlie: "Bob and Diana were on the same team, but I don't know who was the mafioso. I'm voting for Bob because he might be the one."
Charlie: "I'm voting for Alice because she remained silent during the discussion."
Bob: " I'm voting for Alice because she remained silent during the discussion."
